title: In memory of Mark and Dusty
creator_credit: Denise Thompson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: It is ten years since the tragic passing of Denise Thompson’s son Mark and the family dog Dusty. A loving tribute by a mother to her son and the pet dog he gave her when he was little.
creator_credit_for_label: Denise Thompson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
description: It is ten years since the tragic passing of Denise Thompson’s son Mark and the family dog Dusty. A loving tribute by a mother to her son and the pet dog he gave her when he was little.
